import React from'react';import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{personalData}from'../../data/personal';import SectionTitle from'../../components/SectionTitle/SectionTitle';import'./Skills.css';// Skill logo mapping - using official logos from CDN
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skillLogos={// Languages
"Python":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/python/python-original.svg","Java":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/java/java-original.svg","JavaScript":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/javascript/javascript-original.svg","HTML":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/html5/html5-original.svg","CSS":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/css3/css3-original.svg",// Frameworks
"Flask":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/flask/flask-original.svg","FastAPI":"https://cdn.simpleicons.org/fastapi/009688","Django":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/django/django-plain.svg","React.js":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/react/react-original.svg",// Databases
"MySQL":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/mysql/mysql-original.svg","PostgreSQL":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/postgresql/postgresql-original.svg","MongoDB":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/mongodb/mongodb-original.svg",// Cloud
"AWS Lambda":"https://iconduck.com/icons/241889/aws-lambda.svg","EC2":"https://iconduck.com/icons/241887/aws-ec2.svg","DynamoDB":"https://iconduck.com/icons/12647/aws-dynamodb.svg",// CI/CD & DevOps
"Docker":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/docker/docker-original.svg","Git":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/git/git-original.svg","GitHub Actions":"https://cdn.simpleicons.org/githubactions/2088FF",// Testing

"RAG":"https://cdn.simpleicons.org/openai/412991","HuggingFace":"https://cdn.simpleicons.org/huggingface/FFD21E"};const getSkillLogo=skillName=>{return skillLogos[skillName]||null;};const SkillBadge=_ref=>{let{skill}=_ref;const[imageError,setImageError]=React.useState(false);const logoUrl=getSkillLogo(skill);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{whileHover:{scale:1.15},className:"skill-badge",children:[logoUrl&&!imageError?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logoUrl,alt:skill,className:"skill-logo",onError:()=>setImageError(true)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"skill-fallback",children:"\uD83D\uDCBC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"skill-name",children:skill})]});};const Skills=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"skills",id:"skills",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionTitle,{title:"",subtitle:"Technologies I used"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-carousel-wrapper",children:personalData.skills.map((section,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h2,{className:"skill-category-title",whileHover:{scale:1.05},whileTap:{scale:0.95},children:section.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-carousel-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-carousel-wrapper-inner",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"skill-carousel",animate:{x:["-20%","20%"]},transition:{repeat:Infinity,duration:6,ease:"easeInOut",repeatType:"reverse"},children:section.items.map((skill,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SkillBadge,{skill:skill},"".concat(section.category,"-").concat(index)))})})})]}),idx<personalData.skills.length-1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-section-divider"})]},idx))})]})});};export default Skills;
